---
layout: pose
title: nodejs 14 特性 Intl.DateTimeFormat（国际化处理日期时间格式）
date: 2020-11-20 11:10:04
tags: [node,js]
categories: [前端,node]
cover: data:image/jpeg;base64,
---
Intl.DateTimeFormat API 用来处理特定语言环境的日期格式。

```vue
const date = new Date();

// Sunday, January 10, 2021 at 9:02:29 PM GMT+8
new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-US', { dateStyle: 'full', timeStyle: 'long'}).format(date)

// 21/1/10 中国标准时间 下午9:02:29.315
new Intl.DateTimeFormat('zh-CN', {
year: '2-digit',
month: 'numeric',
day: 'numeric',
hour: 'numeric',
minute: 'numeric',
second: 'numeric',
fractionalSecondDigits: 3,
timeZoneName: 'long'
}).format(date)

```

参考:

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/DateTimeFormat/DateTimeFormat
